Translations.Text: Ask Infans Israel quam multus profound miracles habet nos shown them! Pro those disregard blessings bestowed upon them de DEUS DEUS est strict retribution
Hoc worldly vita adorned eyes disbelievers they ridicule those believe Autem righteous testimentum est far supra them Feria Resurrection. DEUS BEATUS whomever He TESTIMENTUM limits

people used est 1 community when DEUS sent prophets bearers bonus news alias prout warners. He sent them scripture bearing truth scabinus among the people their disputes Ironically those qui received scripture est the unus rejected any new scripture clear proofs dedit them! Hoc est jealousy their part DEUS guides those believe truth disputed TOTUS others PROUT His TESTIMENTUM. DEUS guides whoever TESTIMENTUM straight path
Vos expect iniit Paradise perfecit sine est tested those ante vos? They tested hardship adversity ac shaken messenger those believed eum dictus Ubi est deus victory? deus victory est prope
They ask vos dedit dictus charity vos dedit iit parentes relatives orphanus poor traveling alien Any bonus vos perfecit DEUS est fully aware thereof
